conversations.value: Could you perform an in-depth analysis of this photo, including interleaved segmentation masks to map each part of your answer to specific image object?

This aerial image shows an area after a fire. In the scene, there are multiple

destroyed buildings

[SEG] scattered around. In the middle, there are two clustered damaged buildings, and in the lower left part, there is a scattered damaged building. The entire scene is dominated by charred vegetation, gray-white, brown-yellow, dark brown chaotic building ruins, and green forests with soft earth tones.
